hints.content: We can use the cat to compare the heights of the dog and rabbit.

My dog is taller than my cat.  

My rabbit is shorter than my cat.
So, the dog must be taller than my rabbit.

The animals below are in order from shortest to tallest:



![](${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/51453f454f23e371d5a59c9bd5280ce4.png)

question.content:
My dog is taller than my cat.  
My cat is taller than my rabbit.

**Order the animals from shortest to tallest.**  
*Put the shortest animal on the left.*

[[☃ sorter 1]]
